title: Opson's Tools
body_html:
Opson will be equipped with the following tools for managing the Letta tool library:

  1. Add Tool to Library:
    • Name: add_tool
    • Parameters:
      • tool_code (string): The Python code of the tool.
      • tool_name (string): The name of the tool.
      • description (string): A description of the tool's functionality.
      • parameters (list): A list of parameters the tool accepts, including their names, types, and descriptions.
      • validation_results (dict): Results of the validation checks performed by OpenHands.
    • Functionality: Adds a new tool to the Letta tool library after performing independent validation.
  2. List Available Tools:
    • Name: list_tools
    • Parameters: None
    • Functionality: Returns a list of all available tools in the Letta library, including their names and descriptions.
  3. Attach Tool to Agent:
    • Name: attach_tool
    • Parameters:
      • tool_name (string): The name of the tool to attach.
      • agent_id (string): The ID of the agent to attach the tool to.
    • Functionality: Attaches a specified tool to a specified agent.
